display_long_description:
Feel the pulse of MASTERS OF LIGHT, an electrifying wave shooter where you harness unstoppable magic superpowers with 🤜HANDTRACKING 🤛, NOW PLAYABLE IN MIXED REALITY!

"This game makes you feel like a total badass" Naysy

✨2 NEW UPDATES✨ 
Masters of Light is now available in MIXED REALITY 
and guess what, it makes it EXTRA HARD! 

and…

Challenge yourself and your friends with the new SURVIVOR MODE!
Beat unlimited waves of increasing difficulty. How long will you survive??

In CAMPAIGN MODE, conquer 36 levels with unlimited replay, upgrade 5 superpowers, climb the leaderboards and become a superhero, the ultimate Master of Light. ✨

[media]

"This game is a workout!" OtterWordly

Fight, workout and dance to our intense synthwave soundtrack while exploring breathtaking environments.

The galaxy needs you! 

"The hand tracking on this is CRAZY!" TigressX

** Need help with hand tracking? Watch our Youtube tutorials and join our discord. We value your feedback ! **

[media]

**Key features :**
- 2 ways to play : hand-tracking 🤌 or controllers 🎮
- 2 modes: Campaign or Survivor Challenge (NEW!)
- 2 setups: VR or MR (Quest 3 only)
- 3 difficulty modes : easy 😀 / normal 😨 / hard 😱
- 5 superpowers to master and upgrade including freezing time! ⏳
- 7 types of enemies 👿
- 20 trophies to unlock 🏆
- 36 levels and unlimited replay to improve your score! ⚡️
- leaderboards 🥇
- We support bHaptics Full Body Haptic! Sense the magic in your own body 💥

💬 Available in English, Spanish, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese.
